name: Mahjong Food City
description:
A Relaxing, puzzle Mahjong Game! Match identical pairs, clear all the mahjong, Win!
You can travel around the world and experience the most delicious food all around the world when you win every time！

You will be appointed chief editor of the Global Food Show to travel round the world and enjoy exotic food locations around the globe!
Match mahjong and get interesting architecture and delicious food!

The game is free. We also provides some in app purchase items, in order to win the game more quickly.

How to Play：
- Match two same mahjong cards to win.
- Collect achievements for special accomplishments like Panda Mahjong, old photos.
- Visit the famous buildings by win the game.
- Use props, like Shuffle, which allows you to get out of a difficult situation, or Firecracker, a tool for blowing up multiple pairs of tiles.
- Using the gift pack in the game will increase your victory.
- The game will give you stars based on your performance in the game.

Feature:
- Complete the work of appointed chief editor of the Global Food Show and get extra rewards
- Enjoy in fantastic tour around the globe.
- Set out on your food adventure expeditions.
- Hundreds of mahjong levels.
- Classic gameplay.

Boring at home? Come on! Match Mahjong tiles to travel around the world and delicious food!

Find our Facebook page to get the latest info on updates，event and more！
